text: jinham lokam ne iha tuphana utha'i'a uha tuhade hi adara da ika tola hai. Tusim usa nu apane dhakha vica mara na samajho, sagom iha tuhade la'i bihatara hai. Inham vicom hareka bade la'i uha hai jihara papa usane kama'i'a. Ate jisa ne usa vicom sabha tom vada bhaga li'a. Usa la'i vadi saza hai
